text: Joseph William James McDonagh (April 30, 1928 – August 17, 2019) was a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger. He played four games in the National Hockey League with the New York Rangers in the 1949–50 season. McDonagh was born in Rouyn, Quebec, but grew up in Ansonville, Ontario. He died on August 17, 2019 in Toronto at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:New Haven Ramblers players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:International Hockey League (1945–2001) players
title: Bill McDonagh
